description: This file defines URL routing patterns for a Django REST Framework API, mapping URL paths to view functions and class-based views for health checks and event management endpoints.

classes.name: EventListCreateAPIView
classes.description: A class-based view for listing and creating events, extending Django REST Framework generic views.

classes.name: EventRetrieveUpdateDestroyAPIView
classes.description: A class-based view for retrieving, updating, and deleting specific event instances.

methods.name: health
methods.description: A function-based view providing a health check endpoint.

methods.name: as_view
methods.description: Method used to convert class-based views into callable view functions.
